Use it as a storage container for tools such as hammers, screws or nails
Use it as a backpack garden cart. Pack vegetables, fruits or gardening tools into it and then drag it around your garden
Use it as a beach bag to carry towels, sunscreen and other beach amenities. The backpack can also be stored in your tent or beach cabana to keep your belongings organized.
Use it as a travel bag to store clothing, toiletries or other items when traveling by airplane, train or bus.
Use it for urban farming, as a storage container for seeds or seedlings.
